summary: A chest located at the College of Winterhold. This chest contains 3 variations of mage clothing and staffs
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][b][color=#980000]This stand-alone mod will no longer be supported!  It has been merged into [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91997]RetroDaddy's All-In-One Ultimate Kit[/url][/color][/b][/size]

The chest can be found next to the entrance to the Midden in the courtyard of the College of Winterhold.

The chest contains various sets of powerful clothing and a large variety of dangerous staffs.

It is locked with a leveled lock so it may take you a while to be able to access it.

Thanks go to "aluckymuse and The Creation Kids"  for their "Forever Free" image.[/center]
author: RetroDaddy
